### EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been created on the map.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when getting entities by position
  - Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
  - Verify the entity type and position match the expected values.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
* inserter: Prototype.BurnerInserter (not assigned due to error)
* Current inventory: 
  - wooden-chest: 16
  - transport-belt: 7
  - burner-mining-drill: 1
  - wood: 2136
  - coal: 10
  - iron-ore: 1051
  - copper-ore: 30
  - iron-plate: 126
  - iron-gear-wheel: 51
